review: We have a small TV in the kitchen/living room of our house and this is just the item I wanted so I could stream shows and movies from Amazon Prime and Netflix. I had been watching shows on the iPad, but when this came along I thought it was a good deal and was pleased to find it was shipping faster than expected. It arrived at my house with no packaging issues and was easy to set up and super easy to learn to navigate.If you're not too tech savvy, you might need some help with the wireless portion, but the rest is a snap.
